1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: Telah menceritakan kepada kami [Hannad bin As Sarri] berkata, telah menceritakan kepada kami [Abul Ahwash] dari [Abu Ishaq] dari [Abu Hayyah] dari [Ali] ia berkata; "Rasulullah shallallahu 'alaihi wasallam mengusap kepalanya satu kali

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي مَسْحِ الرَّأْسِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning wiping the head
